name: Ratatouille Pasta
description: Dinner hack alert: leftover ratatouille to the rescue! This recipe is all about transforming yesterday’s leftovers into a yummy, weeknight win. We know the struggle of trying to sneak those nutritious veggies into your kids’ meals. Who doesn’t love a pasta night, right?
preparation: In a large pot or Multipurpose Steamer, cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and return to pot.
Add warm ratatouille and ricotta; stir. Spoon into bowls; top with Parmesan.
tips: Make it a casserole! Transfer prepared pasta into a 9" baking dish. Mix 1⁄2 pkg Crispy & Crunchy Coating Mix with an extra 1⁄2 cup grated Parmesan cheese and sprinkle on top. Lightly brush or spray with oil. Bake in preheated 400° F oven until brown and bubbly, about 10 min.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.

summary: Craving the crunch? Add a crispy gluten free coating – that’s never soggy or bland – to protein and veggies and bake them in the oven. You’ll get all the taste of your fave fried foods without a trace of greasiness, so you can enjoy them whenever the craving strikes!
